Key Match Events: Kristijan Jakic scored an own goal in the 94th minute, only for Che Adams to be deemed offside, and VAR overturned the goal to break Scottish hearts and deny them a point.
Ryan Christie struck first for the visitors in the 33rd minute.
Igor Matanovic netted his first goal for his country with a crisp right-footed finish into the far corner after a neat cut-back from Ivan Perisic.
Andrej Kramaric scored the decisive goal in the 70th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke had to make do without several of his key players as a debilitating injury list has denied him the likes of Kieran Tierney, Jack Hendry and Aaron Hickey amongst others.

The absence of goalkeeper Angus Gunn also saw a return for 41-year-old Craig Gordon between the posts, while 18-year-old Ben Doak became the youngest player to start a competitive match for Scotland since Willie Johnston in 1965.
